Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Midway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Midway.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
